page.title: 17PETER AT SCHOOL IN 1985
page.content: We start Infant school in the term we are five years old and move into Juniors school at seven. The school is well equipped with stationery and apparatus and is well supplied with visual aids and colourful and intresting reading material. We learn the basic subjects and science,swimming and drama. There is a school orchestra. In physical education we use large apparatus and also play football, netball,skittle ball,cricket,soft-ball cricket,rounders,and volleyball and take part in athletics and cross-country,competing against other schools. The cane isn't used as a punishment in our school. We may have to write lines or stay in at playtime as a punishment.Our school has a P.T.A which collects money to buy apparatus and equipment for the school. We leave our school at the age of eleven.
